channel.title: svg on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in svg on Barefoot Rob

item.title: curve test
item.description: 22:00 Saturday 12 January 2019 JST Thanks to https://svghelper.com/ for helping me find the curve I need.

item.title: Perl hack to create plaid SVG files
item.description: 15:02 Tuesday 31 March 2015 JST Mutsumi asked if I can make some .svg files for her husband. I tried Artboard, Inkscape and some online things, but none are quite as fast as just spitting out xml via SVG module. Code is on github svg-fabric.

item.title: some more svg stuff
item.description: ##11:02 Sunday 22 March 2015 JST## I plan to use svg pattern fills to do some of the patterns Mutsumi needs.

item.title: playing with SVGs
item.description: ##22:05 Saturday 21 March 2015 JST## Mutsumi has asked if I can convert some of her husband’s fabric designs into vector format. I’ve looked at Inkscape (free), and Artboard (USD $30), and am looking at just “hand”-coding SVG files.
